ygData.subject: Patch Changes
ygData.messageBody:
<After the patch Ive notice a few changes in Permafrost on loot.

I was in perma last night for 5 hours or so and only looted one bronze
sword, usually we walk away with lots of rawhide armor and lots of FS
weapons. Most all the weapons i looted last night were all Rusty, I am
lvl
24 and we were taking blues and whites and yellows.
Also the archaelogist and the preacher never spawned while i was there.

Anyone else see any difference?>


My party hunted there for 4 hours yesterday and found a total of 2 rusty
weapons .. no armor, no bronze, nothing but coins.

This is similar to what happened to the Dervishes in Northern Ro a month
ago. They used to drop bronze weapons and now they only drop rusty
weapons.

Leatherwood
